name: ProShares Ultra VIX Short-Term Futures ETF
description: ProShares Ultra VIX Short-Term Futures ETF (UVIX) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to provide investors with a leveraged exposure to the performance of the S&P 500 VIX Short-Term Futures Index. Launched in 2021, UVIX aims to deliver twice the daily performance of the index, providing investors with an opportunity to profit from volatility in the stock market. The fund primarily invests in VIX futures contracts and is designed for sophisticated investors who are looking for a short-term trading instrument to hedge against market downturns or to capitalize on increased volatility. UVIX is particularly relevant during periods of market uncertainty, as it allows investors to gain exposure to the volatility index, which often rises when equity markets fall. It is important to note that UVIX is not suitable for long-term investors due to its leveraged nature and the compounding effects of daily price fluctuations, which can lead to significant losses if held over longer periods. The fund's objective is to provide high-risk, high-reward opportunities for traders who understand the complexities of volatility trading.
